## untangle

Utility function that splits a `R` script with multiple functions into multiple single function `R` files. This is great for when you recieve endlessly long `R` scripts that you need to organize quickly.

`untangle` can be used in conjunction with [makeOxyFile](#makeoxyfile) in batch mode to quickly turn around long `R` files into a `CRAN` ready package within minutes.

```{r,eval=FALSE}
txt <- "#some comment
#' @import utils
yy <- function(a=4){
 utils::head(runif(10),a)
 # a comment
}

v <- 20

#another comment
#' @import utils
zz <- function(v=10,a=3){
 utils::head(runif(v),pmin(a,v))
}

zz(v)

"
x <- untangle(text = txt)

sapply(x,cat,sep='\n')
```
